name: Petroleum Engineering
tagline: Shaping the future of energy through innovative petroleum engineering

overview.introduction: The Department of Petroleum Engineering focuses on developing expertise in exploration, production, and reservoir engineering while emphasizing sustainable energy practices.
overview.description: Our curriculum combines fundamental petroleum engineering principles with modern technologies in drilling, production optimization, and reservoir management. Students gain practical experience through field visits, industry projects, and state-of-the-art laboratories.

programs.name: B.Tech in Petroleum Engineering
programs.description: Comprehensive program covering exploration, drilling, production, and reservoir engineering with focus on sustainable energy practices.

labs.name: Drilling and Production Laboratory
labs.description: Advanced facility for studying drilling operations and production techniques.

labs.name: Reservoir Engineering Laboratory
labs.description: Modern laboratory for studying reservoir characteristics and behavior.

faculty.name: Dr. Rajiv Malhotra
faculty.bio: Dr. Rajiv Malhotra specializes in reservoir engineering with expertise in enhanced oil recovery techniques.

faculty.name: Dr. Ananya Sharma
faculty.bio: Dr. Ananya Sharma focuses on drilling operations and well completion with expertise in advanced drilling technologies.
